properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord my God!
when I in awesome wonder
Consider all the works
Thy hand hath made
I see the stars,
I hear the mighty thunder
Thy power throughout
the universe displayed.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then sings my soul,
my Saviour God to Thee
How great Thou art!
How great Thou art!
Then sings my soul,
my Saviour God, to Thee
How great Thou art!
How great Thou art!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When through the woods
and forest glades I wander
And hear the birds
sing sweetly in the trees
When I look down
from lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook,
and feel the gentle breeze

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And when I think that God
His Son not sparing
Sent Him to die-
I scarce can take it in
That on the cross
my burden gladly bearing
He bled and died
to take away my sin

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When Christ shall come
with shout of acclamation
And take me home-
what joy shall fill my heart!
Then shall I bow
in humble adoration
And there proclaim,
my God, how great Thou art!
